result.execSummary:
The defendant Akiem L Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Pay all mandatory costs and surcharges.  Cash bail to apply.  Any remaining balance at the end of probation will be due.
Court makes the defendant eligible for expungement following the successful completion of sentence.

Defendant Akiem L Brown not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEFENDANT IS DECEASED.
ANY FINE/FORFEITURES, COSTS, ASSESSMENTS AND SURCHARGES TO BE WAIVED.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $360.00 entered as ordered by the court on 01/13/16 to pay $50.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 09/01/16 Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.
signed, filed and distributed:  Affidavit and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs, .

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense.  Defendant sentenced to serve 90 days (STRAIGHT TIME) in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 1 day time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 12 months.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
     *   Maintain absolute sobriety.  
     *   Pay all mandatory costs and surcharges, cash bail to apply. 
          Any remaining balance at the end of probation will be due 
     *   Successfully complete 20 hours of community
          service with a non-profit organization.

Court makes the defendant eligible for expungement following the successful completion of sentence.
 
Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Rights and Pretrial Incarceration Credit, received and filed

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record. Case scheduled for plea and sentencing. Both the Court and defense attorney are in trials.  Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. Case adjourned to Branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense requests a plea and sentencing date.  Parties are notified that effective August 3, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Judge Lindsey Grady, Branch 23 in Courthouse room 515.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Morgan Wills, appears as intern for the state under the student practice rule under the supervision of  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense requests another status conference date.  No objection from the state. Court grants request. Case adjourned to Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel.  Case heard off the record. Defense counsel requests a status conference date. Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. Parties are notified that effective June 8, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Reserve Judge, Branch 45 in Courthouse room 515.  Status conference scheduled for June 25, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Court held colloquy with defendant. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed Atty. Plaisted to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $60.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month beginning 09-01-0215 and then the 1st of each month there after. Court advised defendant failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Case is adjourned for a Status of Counsel date in branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is not eligible for representation by the public defender's office.  Defendant requests time to retain counsel.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 46. jks
  Status conference scheduled for 05-14-2015 at 01:30 pm.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Akiem L Brown in court with attorney J. Dennis Thornton.  Defendant Akiem L Brown in custody.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to RESERVED BRANCH 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant entered a plea of not guilty.  DEFENDANT DOES  NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER  REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for pretrial in Branch 46.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
